mapper.select: SELECT wz.ORG_NAME as orgName,count(O.ID) as count FROM SCTRANS.SYS_ORG O INNER JOIN SCTRANS.t_sys_org_hierarchy OH ON O.ID = OH.ORG_ID AND O.DEP_HIERARCHY='BUSIGRP' AND O.IS_DELETED='0' AND O.AVAILABLE='1' INNER JOIN SCTRANS.SYS_ORG AR ON OH.BUSIAR_ID = AR.ID INNER JOIN SCTRANS.SYS_ORG SWZ ON OH.BUSISWZ_ID = SWZ.ID INNER JOIN SCTRANS.SYS_ORG WZ ON OH.BUSIWZ_ID = WZ.ID INNER JOIN SCTRANS.SYS_ORG BA ON OH.BUSIBA_ID = BA.ID WHERE O.ORG_CODE NOT IN (select YU_AGENT_TEAM_CODE from [sctrans].[T_TS_TEAM_SCOPE]) and WZ.ORG_NAME not in ('测试区域(区董)','黄浦区域','长宁区域','静安区域','卢湾区域','徐汇5区域','徐汇1区域','徐汇2区域','普陀中心片区','普陀西1区','普陀西2区','普陀西片区','闸北区域','松江区域') group by WZ.ORG_NAME

SELECT count(O.ID) as count FROM SCTRANS.SYS_ORG O INNER JOIN SCTRANS.t_sys_org_hierarchy OH ON O.ID = OH.ORG_ID AND O.DEP_HIERARCHY='BUSIGRP' AND O.IS_DELETED='0' AND O.AVAILABLE='1' INNER JOIN SCTRANS.SYS_ORG AR ON OH.BUSIAR_ID = AR.ID INNER JOIN SCTRANS.SYS_ORG SWZ ON OH.BUSISWZ_ID = SWZ.ID INNER JOIN SCTRANS.SYS_ORG WZ ON OH.BUSIWZ_ID = WZ.ID INNER JOIN SCTRANS.SYS_ORG BA ON OH.BUSIBA_ID = BA.ID WHERE O.ORG_CODE NOT IN (select YU_AGENT_TEAM_CODE from [sctrans].[T_TS_TEAM_SCOPE]) and WZ.ORG_NAME not in ('测试区域(区董)','黄浦区域','长宁区域','静安区域','卢湾区域','徐汇5区域','徐汇1区域','徐汇2区域','普陀中心片区','普陀西1区','普陀西2区','普陀西片区','闸北区域','松江区域')
